name: envoPAP
slogan: envoPAP is a sustainable materials solutions startup utilizing green technology
description:
envoPAP is a sustainable materials solutions startup utilizing green technology to provide agricultural waste with a second life. Our materials are made from the waste of sugarcane fibres after harvest and extraction of cane juice. Use of envoPAP has helped save circa 760,000 trees and using waste resources to generate finished further large scale products. 

Currently, envoPAP is present in 40+ markets in Central and Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa. In just 4 years since inception, envoPAP has grown from a studio startup in St. Johns Wood in London to Offices in London, New York and Pune. Last year marked the launch of envoPAP Research in Chennai & London. We have also started a representative office in Ethiopia marking our entry into the hub for coffee packaging. envoPAP is currently used in Communications, Food-Pack, Labels, Publishing, Agro-Pack, and further research in the process to use envoPAP in Liquid Packaging Applications.

team.title: Founder and CEO
team.name: Kaushal Shah
team.bioHtml: Curator of envoPAP I Committed to Innovation in Sustainable Materials and using waste materials for replacing single-use plastic material I Director at @Inwius

jobs.title: Finance Manager
jobs.description:
The Role
Working closely with the CEO, you will provide commercial, strategic and operational insights across a wide range of projects ranging from equity funding for the business, partnering with sales and commercial teams to provide meaningful insights and recommendations from a financial perspective, looking at product and customer analysis, pricing strategies and market trends, and play a key role in influencing commercial decisions. You will also help to identify areas of improvement to existing reports and processes.

Look forward to taking on a role which empowers you to shape both business growth and your own personal development, alongside a supportive and encouraging team.

Candidates must be commercially minded but also be able to provide and implement practical solutions. We need a 'doer', something who can make an impact and influence business change. You will be a trusted adviser and hold a great deal of responsibility for making a difference.

Candidates will need to have a strong academic background, coupled with a successful track record in an operational role. An accountancy qualification (ACA, CIMA) is preferable.
